alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:35PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Juab... southwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 435 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elberta, or 13 miles west of Payson, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberta, Utah Lake, Genola, Goshen and Eureka. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 141 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
